column4: How do I update my bios if I downloaded a zip file for my motherboard and all it comes with is an exe and a .160 file...
maybe with some sort of dos boot disk?
Im not sure how DOS works I use Linux...
sometimes the exe will contain an iso that you can burn and boot from
yeah i know, but if they dont provide a linux way to do it, then youre gonna have to go to dos
So how would I do this?
first thing id check is try unzipping the exe and maybe youre lucky and there's an iso. if not, then um...no idea how to do the dos boot disk stuf
many .exe's are zips with an executable inside the zip
Nothing happens when I try to unzip the exe
ok then go with what guntbert said. ask the manufacturer
How do I contact MSI xD
ask msi's website how to contact msi :P
